author: Simon Difford
description: A rum-based twist on the ubiquitous and very tasty Espresso Martini.
name: Espresso Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
